name: harith12's Shooter Game
description:
--Instructions--

- WASD for moving controls,

- LMB for shooting gunpowder.

- That's it pretty much of what'd you expect of a simple shooter game.

--Notes and Credits--

- Important thing to say, please click on the enemies as it makes shooting way easier then it has to be.

- The project took about 2 days (nothing special) and I made this from a tutorial from SammyCheez (really cool guy) and the SFX are just gunshots, gun reloading and taking damage.
